dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, does AI threaten Kazakh cinema, or what? Who even cares, honestly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, does A I threaten Kazakh cinema, or what? Who even cares, honestly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no, um, you should care. I mean, it's a legitimate question.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no, um, you should care. I mean, it's a legitimate question.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but Kazakhstan? Really? And like, the answer... I heard it involved Timothée Chalamet. Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but Kazakhstan? Really? And like, the answer... I heard it involved Timothée Chalamet. Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To this, the Vice Minister quoted the famous American actor Timothee Chalamet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so Vice Minister Yevgeniy Kochetov, he was asked, like, if specialists will be uncompetitive. And yeah, he did quote Chalamet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so Vice Minister Yevgeniy Kochetov, he was asked, like, if specialists will be uncompetitive. And yeah, he did quote Chalamet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A journalist asked the Vice Minister: Is there a danger for specialists in the world of cinema, who in the near future may remain uncompetitive in the labor market? To this, the Vice Minister quoted the famous American actor Timothee Chalamet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Chalamet. The Dune guy. What did he say that's so profound for AI policy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chalamet. The Dune guy. What did he say that's so profound for A I policy?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He is best known for his roles in such films as: Dune, Little Women, Wonka, and Call Me by Your Name.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, Chalamet apparently said, you know, the film industry is super subjective, always tailored to a person, people evaluate films differently. So AI, like, just helps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, Chalamet apparently said, you know, the film industry is super subjective, always tailored to a person, people evaluate films differently. So A I, like, just helps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "You know, during the last Oscar awards, Timothee Chalamet said a very good phrase that the film industry is a very subjective industry, where everything is still tailored to a person and each person evaluates this or that film differently. That is why artificial intelligence is only helpful here. It is not from the point of view of replacing a person.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, AI just "helps." Right. Like my smart speaker "helps" me forget phone numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, A I just helps. Right. Like my smart speaker helps me forget phone numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but the minister actually said AI, you know, it 'cuts off sharp corners.' And that a person will still make the industry. Their ideas, their content.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but the minister actually said A I, you know, it 'cuts off sharp corners.' And that a person will still make the industry. Their ideas, their content.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his opinion, artificial intelligence in the film industry should simplify human work, "cut off sharp corners". ... "A person will still make the industry, no matter how you look at it. His ideas will be made, his author's content will be made," Yevgeniy Kochetov answered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like, uh, wishful thinking. Or a buzzword bingo situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like, uh, wishful thinking. Or a buzzword bingo situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But they're, like, enthusiastically waiting for young people to use AI in cinema. They want to simplify it. That's, that's kind of a big statement, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're, like, enthusiastically waiting for young people to use A I in cinema. They want to simplify it. That's, that's kind of a big statement, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "...on the contrary, we are enthusiastically, with bated breath, waiting for a large number of young people to go into the field of cinema and art and use artificial intelligence. And we will do everything to simplify this," the official added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but how does Chalamet make that relevant? It just feels so... random.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but how does Chalamet make that relevant? It just feels so... random.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, other deputies in Kazakhstan are worried. Like, Daulet Mukaev, he wants to restrict ChatGPT for schoolchildren. And Elnur Beisenbaev is worried about AI's impact across industries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, other deputies in Kazakhstan are worried. Like, Daulet Mukaev, he wants to restrict ChatGPT for schoolchildren. And Elnur Beisenbaev is worried about A I's impact across industries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, earlier, mazhilis deputy Daulet Mukaev proposed restricting the use of ChatGPT by schoolchildren in Kazakhstan, citing concerns over its impact on intellectual development. Another Mazhilis deputy Elnur Beisenbaev expressed concern about how AI could influence various industries in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, some guys are like, "AI good," and others are like, "AI bad, for kids." Classic government, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, some guys are like, A I good, and others are like, A I bad, for kids. Classic government, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it shows, like, it's not just a Kazakh thing. It's a real tension, you know, between embracing tech and, uh, protecting human creativity. Or jobs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it shows, like, it's not just a Kazakh thing. It's a real tension, you know, between embracing tech and, uh, protecting human creativity. Or jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. I guess. Still, Chalamet. Wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. I guess. Still, Chalamet. Wild.
